attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The resale of musical event tickets on Ebay .This pushes up the purchase price of these tickets to the real fans .
It is clear that many people buy tickets in order to profit from the sale of them on Ebay .
The ordinary customer , inland revenue and the event organiser lose out because of this.
( Look at how much effort and money Glastonbury has to put in simply to avoid this ) 
The sale of football match tickets , for different reasons ,is already banned .so it is entirely possible to do this .

rejection.details: The title of your petition must include a call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
